item.title: Papercrete
item.description: 1 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xPW9C-CtU9s The process implemented to create Papercrete stools for my University research project. 2 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BCcWJ58nbDg Uploaded on Mar 29, 2009 Utilize papercrete as in-fill around plate windows.

item.title: Straw Bale Home Construction Instructional Video
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LZABqaEsrLM https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WhSpMSGeV0Y 2 hour and 42 minute video on Vimeo on Demand: http://vimeo.com/ondemand/buildingwithawareness Straw bale house conctruction is shown in this movie trailer for the “Building With Awareness” DVD video. Straw bale walls, thermal mass walls, earth plaster techniques, and passive solar design are all explained in this how-to DVD on building with natural materials.
